title: metadata-string-replace
description:
Replace a string in all metadata of a file.

Replaces all occurrences of <find-string> in the metadata and map names of <input-file> with <replace-string>.

input_file.title: input_file
input_file.description: the file to replace metadata in

output_file.title: output_file
output_file.description: output - the name to save the modified file as
